description: Are you detail-oriented and passionate about fashion? Join the rapidly expanding global womenswear brand, Naked Wardrobe team as a Merchandise Planner In this role, you will utilize in-house inventory data and trend analysis to collaborate with various departments such as design, marketing, wholesale, and inventory. As a Merchandise Planner, you will play a key role in overseeing the lifecycle of garments, from their initial concept to being displayed on shop floors to sell through. If you have a keen eye for detail and a love for all things fashion, this role is for you.
responsibilities:
•	Collaborate with the design team to develop and execute merchandising strategies that align with our brand vision.
•	Analyze sales data and market trends to make informed decisions on product selection and pricing.
•	Optimize sales by ensuring the right products are in stock with the right quantities to capitalize on trends/demand to meet monthly goals.
•	Lead, create, and drive assortment strategies. Develop strong relationships with vendors and partners to ensure timely delivery of merchandise.
•	Monitor inventory levels and make recommendations for restocking or discontinuing products.
•	Stay up-to-date on industry trends and competitor activities to identify opportunities for growth.
•	Work closely with the marketing team to develop promotional campaigns and events.
•	Excellent problem-solving and multitasking skills.
•	Other duties as assigned.

qualifications.required:
Bachelor's degree in Fashion Merchandising, Marketing, Business, or related field
4-6 years of extensive background in merchandise planning with a focus on E-commerce apparel and Wholesale
Strong understanding of current fashion trends and consumer preferences
NetSuite and Shopify experience a strong plus
Advanced Excel skills and other data analysis tools
Excellent analytical and organizational skills
Strategic-thinker with a passion for retail and a knack for numbers
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and knowledge of merchandising software
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Detail-oriented with a knack for numbers and a passion for retail
Ability to work well under pressure and meet deadlines
